attributes.action: Make it compulsory for all councils to scan all pets found deceased
attributes.additional_details: we want to make it compulsory for all councils to scan all deceased pets .to some people its just a cat or dog but its not they are a part of a family people need closure as to where their pets are .the councils are so quick just to bag the animals up and incinerate them I ask you to please stop this cruel and disgusting procedure
